title: Review: Specialized’s New Propero 4 Helmet and Torch 3.0 Road Shoes Move Upmarket
content:
Specialized promises S-Works tech at a lower price with their new Propero 4 helmet and Torch 3.0 road shoes.

Read the full article at Review: Specialized’s New Propero 4 Helmet and Torch 3.0 Road Shoes Move Upmarket on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
